definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: An anti-nuclear demonstrator protest in Parliament Square in London March 14, 2007.
sentences.chinese: 英國倫敦國會廣場前抗議的反核示威者。

sentences.english: So far, there hasn't been a groundswell of anti-nuclear demonstrations.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，還沒有反核示威浪潮。

sentences.english: Anti-nuclear demonstrators stand in front of a water cannon during a protest outside a nuclear waste storage facility in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 德國核廢料存儲工廠外舉行抗議行遊的反核主義者們。

sentences.english: Chapter Three analyses the influence of the Anti-nuclear Peace Movement of Britain.
sentences.chinese: 第三章分析了英國反核和平運動的影響。

sentences.english: Anti-nuclear activists marched in Japan Monday to build momentum for their movement.
sentences.chinese: 反核活動人士星期一在日本遊行，爲他們的運動造勢。

sentences.english: This is the policy favoured by tha antinuclear camp.
sentences.chinese: 這項政策得到了反核陣營的支持。

sentences.english: She was caught up in the anti-nuclear movement.

definition: DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan)/abbr. for 民主進步黨|民主进步党
Fourth Nuclear Power Plant near New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan/also called Lungmen Nuclear Power Plant
Tsai Ing-wen (1956-), Taiwanese DPP politician, president of the Republic of China from 2016
social movement/abbr. for 社會運動|社会运动
Chen Shui-Bian (1950-), Taiwanese DPP 民進黨|民进党 politician, president of the Republic of China 2000-2008
army, civil service and education/all branches of state employment
Frank Chang-ting Hsieh (1946-), Taiwanese DPP politician, mayor of Kaohsiung 1998-2005
William Lai Ching-te (1959-), Taiwanese DPP politician, vice president of the Republic of China from 2020
Lee Teng-hui (1923-2020), Taiwanese politician, president of ROC 1988-2000
Taiwan independence/(of Taiwan) to declare independence
abbr. for 立法委員會|立法委员会[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2 hui4]/abbr. for 立法委員|立法委员[li4 fa3 wei3 yuan2]
Ma Ying-jeou (1950-), Taiwanese Kuomintang politician, Mayor of Taipei 1998-2006, president of Republic of China 2008-2016
